parameters.name: wait_for_active_shards
parameters.description: Sets the number of shard copies that must be active before proceeding with the operation. Defaults to 1, meaning the primary shard only. Set to `all` for all shard copies, otherwise set to any non-negative value less than or equal to the total number of copies for the shard (number of replicas + 1).

schema.description: Sets the number of shard copies that must be active before proceeding with the operation. Defaults to 1, meaning the primary shard only. Set to `all` for all shard copies, otherwise set to any non-negative value less than or equal to the total number of copies for the shard (number of replicas + 1).

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: If `true` then refresh the affected shards to make this operation visible to search, if `wait_for` then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search, if `false` (the default) then do nothing with refreshes.

parameters.name: pre_filter_shard_size
parameters.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

schema.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

parameters.name: max_concurrent_shard_requests
parameters.description: The number of concurrent shard requests each sub search executes concurrently per node. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

schema.description: The number of concurrent shard requests each sub search executes concurrently per node. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

parameters.description: The number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. This value should be used as a protection mechanism to reduce the memory overhead per search request if the potential number of shards in the request can be large.

schema.description: The number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. This value should be used as a protection mechanism to reduce the memory overhead per search request if the potential number of shards in the request can be large.

parameters.name: max_concurrent_shard_requests
parameters.description: The number of concurrent shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

schema.description: The number of concurrent shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

parameters.name: pre_filter_shard_size
parameters.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

schema.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

get.description: Allows to execute several search operations in one request.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of indices to use as default.

schema.description: Comma-separated list of indices to use as default.

parameters.description: Search operation type.

parameters.description: Controls the maximum number of concurrent searches the multi search api will execute.

schema.description: Controls the maximum number of concurrent searches the multi search api will execute.

parameters.name: typed_keys
parameters.description: Specify whether aggregation and suggester names should be prefixed by their respective types in the response.

schema.description: Specify whether aggregation and suggester names should be prefixed by their respective types in the response.

parameters.name: pre_filter_shard_size
parameters.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

schema.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

parameters.name: max_concurrent_shard_requests
parameters.description: The number of concurrent shard requests each sub search executes concurrently per node. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

schema.description: The number of concurrent shard requests each sub search executes concurrently per node. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

schema.description: Indicates whether hits.total should be rendered as an integer or an object in the rest search response.

parameters.name: batched_reduce_size
parameters.description: The number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. This value should be used as a protection mechanism to reduce the memory overhead per search request if the potential number of shards in the request can be large.

schema.description: The number of shard results that should be reduced at once on the coordinating node. This value should be used as a protection mechanism to reduce the memory overhead per search request if the potential number of shards in the request can be large.

parameters.name: max_concurrent_shard_requests
parameters.description: The number of concurrent shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

schema.description: The number of concurrent shard requests per node this search executes concurrently. This value should be used to limit the impact of the search on the cluster in order to limit the number of concurrent shard requests.

parameters.name: pre_filter_shard_size
parameters.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

schema.description: Threshold that enforces a pre-filter round-trip to prefilter search shards based on query rewriting if the number of shards the search request expands to exceeds the threshold. This filter round-trip can limit the number of shards significantly if for instance a shard can not match any documents based on its rewrite method ie. if date filters are mandatory to match but the shard bounds and the query are disjoint.

parameters.description: Indicates whether hits.total should be rendered as an integer or an object in the rest search response.

schema.description: Indicates whether hits.total should be rendered as an integer or an object in the rest search response.
